â€œI was fortunate enough to get to try this strain before it was even listed on Leafly! 

VERY unique smell and flavor, and kind of a hard strain to come across. Has a sweet smell on the coffeeish/tobacco/earthy side of things. Taste is somewhat fruity with light notes of chocolate and nutty undertones. 

Heady, stoney, smiley stuff here.

And like I said, this strain can be difficult to find, so if ya see it, GRAB SOM...â€

column3: â€œThis strain is not one that called out to me through appearance.  The name Chocolate Hashberry was enticing enough to get me to take a sniff from the jar.  Even that left me a little turned off with the bud giving off a light sweet grass smell.  This budtender obviously new his herb because like a true professional without a word a bud was broken open with tweezers.  Such a simple act spoke volumes in my nostrils giv...â€

â€œReviewed under Hashberry prior to its listing as its own strain.

Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer. 

Pros: Strong pain relief and euphoric head high. More hybrid than straight indica. Good if you need to eat, made me quite hungry. 

Cons: Dry eyes and some dry mouth. Little groggy after waking up, still felt some of the head effects.

Overall/Other: Smooth draw and exhale. Taste was sweet/earthy. I could tas...â€
â€œSuper sleepy strain with nice purple buds and caked with trichomes, makes me wanna slap a bag of hot Cheetos in my mouth and still eat dinner.â€

â€œI recently bought a gram of this strain from a local shop (ReLeaf, Vallejo CA) for migraine pain. It was the first time a strain actively numbed my pain. Though only the mild ones, it did nothing for the higher pain headaches.

It's a wonderful little bud covered in trichomes and it's always fluffy. I was attracted to it initially by look alone. It's definitely a pretty bud.â€

â€œThis is consistently the best looking bud in the shop. Others are more dense but this one is simply covered in trichomes. Its green leaves verge on tan because of this. This provides a visually appealing contrast to the orange hairs and large amounts of purple.
